title: FS or Trade: Johnny Kling & Addie Joss Portrait
author: jamest206

posts.post_title: FS or Trade: Johnny Kling & Addie Joss Portrait
posts.post_content:
Kling is PSA 4 SOLD/TRADED

Joss Portrait is SGC 50/4 

Looking to downgrade both.   The above cards are for sale, or will trade for lower grade plus cash or cash/portraits deal. My collection is lower grade.  Would love to trade for either combo raw or lower grade with some integrity to portrait. 

I’ll also trade both for a Cobb portrait graded Authentic, 1 or 2.  Need some integrity to it, as it is displayed at my office.  
Combos looking for. Chance red portrait, Kling, Cy Young portrait , Joss portrait. 

PM or email me [email]jamesmckee2018@gmail.com or jmckee@thinmetalparts.com
Email sent James. I have a Kling PSA 3.

Kling went to bob on a trade!!!!   Thanks
